r.d: This is the Oracle OCI8 MDB2 driver.
r.n:
- types can now always be keyed by name or by order
open todo items: - handle autoincremement fields in alterTable() - there are still a number of missing methods in the reverse and datatype module - there are still severe stability issues due to ext/oci8, especially on windows - ensure that all primary/unique/foreign key handling is only in the contraint methods
